snippet: Timothy D. Cook, Apple’s chief executive, introduced a smartwatch, a wearable device that combines health and fitness tracking with communications.

Apple announced the release of its newest smartphone, the iPhone 7. The new model replaces its headphone jack with  a Lightning connector and includes an improved camera.
Timothy D. Cook, Apple’s chief executive, introduced the Apple Watch, an edition of which is made of 18-karat gold and retails starting at $10,000.
